qas.question: What requirements does your vaccination certificate need to have in austria?

answers.text: same requirements above for the EUDCC

paragraphs.context: Documents equivalent to the 'EU Digital COVID Certificate' are also accepted, if they meet the same requirements above for the EUDCC.

qas.question: Does my ten year old need to provide proof of vaccination to travel in austria?

answers.text: Children under 12 years and travelling with an adult are generally exempt

qas.question: What does my 15 year old child need to provide to travel in austria?

answers.text: proof of vaccination, recovery or a negative test result

paragraphs.context: Children under 12 years and travelling with an adult are generally exempt from the requirement to carry proof of vaccination, recovery or a negative test result.
